name: Sharkjaw Skeleton
description: The Sharkjaw Skeleton carries the predatory traits of a shark, featuring many jaws and a skeletal structure that instills fear.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and devour prey makes it a terrifying opponent in combat.
goals: Subdue and destroy foes, using its grappling abilities to control the battlefield.
relations: Related to other undead creatures and may serve powerful necromancers.
environment: Typically found in dark areas, such as crypts or underwater ruins.
strengths: Strong offensive capabilities, especially with grappling and restraining opponents.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage, making it susceptible to certain attacks.
attacks: Bite attack that can deal significant piercing damage and grapple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Devouring Embrace, which allows it to restrain and continuously damage a grappled target.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, enhancing its ability to detect foes.
skills: Has average Perception and good Stealth skills for ambushing opponents.
additional_information: Resilient to cold and poison damage.
Immunity to exhaustion and being poisoned.
Functions without air, food, drink, or sleep due to Undead Nature.
Can grapple up to two targets simultaneously.
Requires a successful Strength check to free a devoured target.
test_queries: large predatory skeleton in dark places
terrifying undead with a shark-like bite
